query.description: The text to search within object names and content; use types field for type filtering

sort.description: The sorting options for the search results

direction.description: The direction to sort the search results by
direction.title: apimodel.SortDirection

property_key.description: The key of the property to sort the search results by
property_key.title: apimodel.SortProperty

sort.title: apimodel.SortOptions

types.description: The types of objects to include in results (e.g., "page", "task", "bookmark"); see ListTypes endpoint for valid values

body.description: The search parameters used to filter and sort the results
